short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Youtube QR Share is an extension that allows you to share youtube videos with a QR code so you can later on scan on your phone

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever needed to switch from your computer to your phone while watching a YouTube video? Then this extension is for you. Using this extension will allow you to scan your YouTube video using a QR code. Just visit any YouTube video and press the share button to see a QR code appear that you can scan on your mobile device.
